long_description: Even though the Gregory Z25 Pack is small in appearance, it's more than capable of carrying heavy loads in comfort on your next day hike. Updated CrossFlo(TM) suspension provides cooling airflow across the back, without sacrificing load transfer. Harness and waistbelt use moisture-wicking mesh to help keep you dry on these main contact points of the body. Panel-loading access to the main compartment. Exterior zippered top pocket with key clip; 2 exterior stretch water-bottle pockets. The Gregory Z25 Pack features an interior sleeve with a port for a hydration reservoir (sold separately).
short_description: Even though the Gregory Z25 Pack is small in appearance, it's more than capable of carrying heavy loads in comfort on your next day hike.
